lead_paragraph: After being forced into sexual acts, the girls reported the attacks to faculty staff, but complaints filed by a Brooklyn lawyer on behalf of the teenagers say the schools did little to help the victims.

headline.print_headline: Complaints Say Schools Discredited Sex Assault Reports
headline.main: Schools Punished Teenagers for Being Victims of Sexual Assault, Complaints Say

snippet: After being forced into sexual acts, the girls reported the attacks to faculty staff, but complaints filed by a Brooklyn lawyer on behalf of the teenagers say the schools did little to help the victims.
abstract: Two complaints filed with United States Dept of Education's Office for Civil Rights accuse New York City Education Dept of discrediting and punishing victims of sexual assault, particularly if they are black and poor.
